overview: It tells how contemporary rural youth such as Ma Chenggong and Ma Dangxian have overcome many difficulties under the guidance of the national precision poverty alleviation policy, helping villagers build cherry orchards, improving the quality of farmhouses, renovating old walls and graffiti, creating beautiful villages, and finally opening up a new way of mutual help and cooperation to get rich together. The story of leading the masses out of poverty and becoming rich in rural areas.
title: Village Mazui
